comments: Keep up the good work specially when it comes to student's concerns!!!
It is sad that UE College of Engineering is one of the few colleges that's still in online learning.
Set up a webinar teaching them how to use online tools for teaching
The department responds quickly on majority of student concerns. However, there is a difficulty in opening or rescheduling subjects during the online registration period.
Lack of communication between the staff of the university to the students.
I have no issues or any suggestions I have in mind right now
Engineering department services are very approachable.
not accomodating sometimes but overall have a good experience
Could gain to have more professors.
Everything flows smoothly when it comes to different concerns. Very easy to have mutual understanding between the department and students. That's all!
The office of the engineering department is very accommodating and very approvable. their officers is very active when it comes to communication.
